title: Can't access my old account
body:
I had been mia from League for over a year, and when I came back to login it asked me for a new password and I had to make a new account out of my old account. 

However, I can see and visit my old account. So now I have my old accounts Username to login but I can't login to it.

Tried to contact Rot but I guess i didn't reach the right people cause I didn't get anything back from them.

replies.body: It must be sacry coming back to find that you can't access your account, but don't worry!  If the steps in the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide, just reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account recovery team can review your case, and help get your account back in your hands.  Hang tight until then!
